snippet: Teams in the Hamptons Collegiate Baseball League work year round to line up summer hosts for their players, which is not easy in an area where rooms rent for hundreds of dollars a night.
abstract: Players in Hampton Collegiate Baseball League work year round to line up residents on Long Island who will host them free of charge; players can often be found at Hamptons summer camps, youth sporting events, churches and dance recitals trying to gain favor with residents; more established leagues pay their host families.
lead_paragraph: Teams in the Hamptons Collegiate Baseball League work year round to line up summer hosts for their players, which is not easy in an area where rooms rent for hundreds of dollars a night.

headline.seo: In Hamptons Baseball League, Housing Is Difficult to Find
headline.main: Amid All the Diamonds, a Bed Would Be Nice
headline.print_headline: Amid All the Diamonds, a Bed Would Be Nice
